summary: The bill, titled the Advanced Reactor Modernization for Operational Resilience Act of 2025 (ARMOR Act), proposes a pilot program run by the Secretary of the Army to provide resilient energy to critical infrastructure on Army installations using advanced nuclear reactors (micro-reactors or small modular reactors). The bill also authorizes multi-year contracts (up to 50 years) for energy from these reactors and adds nuclear energy and technology to the covered technology category for the Department of Defense's Office of Strategic Capital.
